articles.title: ‘A new low’: USA erupts over Cup disaster - news.com.au
articles.description: America’s hopes of advancing to the World Cup quarterfinals for the first time since 2002 went up in smoke in a 3-1 defeat against the Netherlands — and the Yanks watching on at home weren’t happy.
articles.content:
